name: gasLimit
description: the system-wide maximum amount of gas permitted in this block

name: gasUsed
description: the total amount of gas used in this block

name: hash
description: the hash of the current block

name: difficulty
description: the computational difficulty at this block

name: finalized
description: flag indicating the system considers this data final

name: timestamp
description: the unix timestamp of the object

name: baseFeePerGas
description: the base fee for this block

name: transactions
description: a possibly empty array of transactions or transaction hashes

name: tx_hashes
description: a possibly empty array of transactions or transaction hashes

name: name
description: the name of the block if any (see chifra when)

name: light
description: `true` if this block is only the block header, `false` otherwise

name: date
description: the date of this block as represented by its timestamp

name: unclesCnt
description: the number of uncles in this block

name: extraData
description: an extra data string for use in the front end only
